name: Tag Attack
description:
-- -- -- - U N D E R W O R K !!!! -- -- -- --

Disclaimer: I'm setting a new server. Check soon in @escueladebits (twitter)

This game was developed for the Brittish Library Game Jam. It's designed to use the player's Flow mental state achieved in the game to better crowdsourced tagging of library's collection.

https://github.com/escueladebits/TagAttack/blob/ma...

Arrow Keys + CTRL
